summary:
Exiled form his Vampire clan for weaknesses of the blood, Kraal now drowns out his sorrows in the Sleeping Giants Inn at River wood. He\\\'s a follower that specializes in two handed and heavy armor, not the common load out for a Vampire. 
This is my first npc made with the creation kit. Any feedback would be appreciated.
descriptionHtml:
He\'s a follower that specializes in two handed and heavy armor, not the common load out for a Vampire. 
This is my first npc made with the creation kit. Any feedback would be appreciated. Lore friendly if you\'re playing a vampire and want a follower.
author: Bongo Bay
